description: This is a course for individuals , families , groups and businesses to use in planning for emergencies. You will learn how and why to include a communication plan, and a Document kit to your planning. You will learn why it is important to involve all family members in planning and implementation. Finaly, whether it is a storm, earthquake, or terrorist attack, you need to know what plans to have in place for your resiliency and survival. This course is intended to help you plan for any eventuality and be ready to not just cope but weather the event with minimum difficulty.
title: Disaster Planning
